description: Can you hear the call of the mountains? With the Runbold Guide Pants, you can hike all the way to the summit. The pants are made from a comfortable soft shell material with elasticated properties to support greater freedom of movement. The water-repellent treatment of the outer material is PFC-free. Two front pockets, a seat pocket and a “coin pocket” provide space for small objects. The high-quality workmanship gives the Runbold Guide Pants a modern look and ensures outstanding comfort on demanding tours.
name: Mammut Runbold Guide SO Pants, Reg - Mens
